(_uiState.value.amount.isNotEmpty() && newShares.isNotEmpty() && newShares != \".\") {\n conversionJob?.cancel()\n conversionJob = viewModelScope.launch {\n delay(300)\n performConversion()\n }\n } else if (newShares.isEmpty()) {\n // Clear total costs if shares are cleared\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(\n totalCostInFrom = \"\",\n totalCostInTo = \"\"\n )\n }\n }\n }\n\n fun onFromCurrencySelected(currency: CurrencyItem) {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(\n fromCurrency = currency,\n showCurrencyPicker = false\n )\n if (_uiState.value.amount.isNotEmpty()) {\n performConversion()\n }\n }\n\n fun onToCurrencySelected(currency: CurrencyItem) {\n _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(\n toCurrency = currency,\n showCurrencyPicker = false\n )\n if (_uiState.value.amount.isNotEmpty()) {\n performConversion()\n }\n }\n\n fun onSwapCurrencies() {\n val currentState = _uiState.value\n _uiState.value = currentState.copy(\n fromCurrency = import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.fillMaxSize
import androidx.compose.material3.MaterialTheme
import androidx.compose.material3.Surface
import androidx.compose.runtime.*
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.lifecycle.viewmodel.compose.viewModel
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.data.StockWithPrice
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.ui.screens.MainScreen
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.ui.screens.StockListScreen
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.ui.screens.ForexMarketScreen
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.ui.theme.SimpleConvertTheme
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.viewmodel.MainViewModel
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.viewmodel.StockListViewModel
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.viewmodel.ForexMarketViewModel

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 SimpleConvertTheme {
 Surface(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.background
 ) {
 ForexCalculatorApp()
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun ForexCalculatorApp() {
 val mainViewModel: MainViewModel = viewModel()
 val stockListViewModel: StockListViewModel = viewModel()
 val forexMarketViewModel: ForexMarketViewModel = viewModel()

 var showStockList by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var showForexMarket by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var selectedStock by remember { mutableStateOf<StockWithPrice?>(null) }

 if (showStockList) {
 StockListScreen(
 viewModel = stockListViewModel,
 onStockSelected = { stock ->
 selectedStock = stock
 showStockList = false
 },
 onBackPressed = {
 showStockList = false
 }
 )
 } else if (showForexMarket) {
 ForexMarketScreen(
 viewModel = forexMarketViewModel,
 onBackPressed = {
 showForexMarket = false
 }
 )
 } else {
 MainScreen(
 viewModel = mainViewModel,
 selectedStock = selectedStock,
 onBrowseStocksClick = {
 showStockList = true
 },
 onForexMarketClick = {
 showForexMarket = true
 },
 onStockUsed = {
 selectedStock = null
 }
 )
 }
}

</manifest>"},{"role":"tool","name":"read_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_01RfsbmdLrp86rm8Whs1DqTo","content":"# SimpleConvert - Modern Forex Calculator App

A premium, smooth, and incredibly easy-to-use Android Foreign Exchange (Forex) Calculator app built
with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose.

## Features

### Real-Time Price Graphs

- **Live Currency Exchange Charts**: Real-time visualization of exchange rates with historical
 tracking
- **Forex Market Dashboard**: Monitor 10 popular currency pairs simultaneously with auto-refresh
- **Stock Price Graphs**: Individual price charts for each stock with trend indicators
- **Auto-Refresh**: Automatic updates every 10-30 seconds depending on data type
- **Interactive Charts**: Toggle chart visibility, manual refresh, and color-coded trends
- **Historical Data**: Track up to 30 data points per currency pair or 20 for stocks
- **Top Movers Chart**: Visual comparison of the most active stocks

 **[View Complete Graph Guide](REAL_TIME_GRAPHS_GUIDE.md)**

### Core Functionality

- **Single Screen UI**: All functionality on one clean, uncluttered screen
- **Real-time Currency Conversion**: Automatic conversion as you type with 300ms debounce
- **Large Amount Input**: Clear, focused OutlinedTextField with numeric-decimal keyboard
- **Searchable Currency Selection**: Full-screen modal with search functionality
- **Currency Swap**: Quick FAB button to instantly reverse currency selection
- **Exchange Rate Display**: Shows converted amount and inverse rate (e.g., "1 USD = 1.18 EUR")

### Premium UI/UX

- **Material 3 Design**: Modern, clean interface with light/dark theme support
- **Smooth Animations**:
 - Shimmer loading effect while fetching rates
 - AnimatedContent transitions for result updates
 - Slide-up modal transitions for currency picker
- **Auto-focus**: Amount input automatically receives focus on app launch
- **Error Handling**: Graceful error messages without crashes
- **State-Driven Architecture**: MVVM pattern with StateFlow for reactive UI

## API Integration

Uses the free, key-less **Frankfurter API** (api.frankfurter.dev):

- **Currency List**: `https://api.frankfurter.dev/currencies`
- **Conversion**: `https://api.frankfurter.dev/latest?amount={amount}&from={from}&to={to}`

## Technology Stack

### Architecture

- **MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel)** pattern
- **StateFlow** for state management
- **Kotlin Coroutines** for asynchronous operations
- **Repository Pattern** for data layer abstraction

### Libraries & Dependencies

- **Jetpack Compose** - Modern declarative UI framework
- **Material 3** - Latest Material Design components
- **Retrofit 2** - Type-safe HTTP client
- **Gson** - JSON serialization/deserialization
- **Lifecycle ViewModel Compose** - ViewModel integration with Compose
- **Coroutines** - Asynchronous programming
- **Vico Charts** - Material 3 compatible charting library for real-time data visualization

## Project Structure

```
app/src/main/java/com/example/forexcalculatorapp/
 data/
 CurrencyApiService.kt # Retrofit API interface
 CurrencyRepository.kt # Data repository
 ConversionResponse.kt # API response models
 RetrofitInstance.kt # Retrofit singleton
 ui/
 components/
 CurrencyCard.kt # Currency selector card
 CurrencyPickerModal.kt # Searchable currency list
 ShimmerEffect.kt # Loading animation
 screens/
 MainScreen.kt # Main app screen
 theme/
 Theme.kt # Material 3 theme
 Type.kt # Typography configuration
 viewmodel/
 MainViewModel.kt # App state management
 MainActivity.kt # App entry point
```

## Building & Running

1. **Clone the repository**
2. **Open in Android Studio** (Hedgehog or later recommended)
3. **Sync Gradle files**
4. **Run on device or emulator** (requires API 25+)

### Requirements

- **Minimum SDK**: 25 (Android 7.1)
- **Target SDK**: 36
- **Kotlin**: 2.0.21
- **Gradle**: 8.13.0

## Key Implementation Details

### Debounced Conversion

API calls are debounced by 300ms to avoid spamming the server while the user types.

### State Management

All UI state is managed through a single `MainUiState` data class, making the UI a pure function of
state.

### Error Handling

Network errors are caught and displayed as non-intrusive messages. The result shows "N/A" when rates
can't be fetched.

### Shimmer Loading

Custom shimmer effect provides visual feedback during API calls, creating a smooth, premium feel.

### Focus Management

The amount input automatically receives focus on app launch for immediate user interaction.

## License

This project is created as a demonstration of modern Android development practices.

## Credits

- **API**: [Frankfurter API](https://www.frankfurter.app/) - Free, open-source currency exchange
 rates
- **Design**: Material 3 Design System
- **Framework**: Jetpack Compose

com.example.forexcalculatorapp.data\n\nimport com.google.ai.client.generativeai.GenerativeModel\nimport com.google.ai.client.generativeai.type.content\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow\nimport kotlinx.coroutines.flow.flow\n\nclass GeminiService(apiKey: String) {\n \n private val generativeModel = GenerativeModel(\n modelName = \"gemini-1.5-flash\",\n apiKey = apiKey\n )\n \n /**\n * Send a message to Gemini and get a response\n */\n suspend fun sendMessage(prompt: String): Result<String> {\n return try {\n val response = generativeModel.generateContent(prompt)\n val text = response.text ?: \"No response received\"\n Result.success(text)\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n Result.failure(e)\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * Send a message with streaming response\n */\n fun sendMessageStream(prompt: String): Flow<String> = flow {\n try {\n val response = generativeModel.generateContentStream(prompt)\n response.collect { chunk ->\n chunk.text?.let { emit(it) }\n }\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n emit(\"Error: ${e.message}\")\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * Send a forex-specific query with context\n */\n suspend fun askForexQuestion(question: String): Result<String> {\n val contextualPrompt = \"\"\"\n You are a helpful forex and financial market assistant. \n Answer the following question about forex, currency exchange, or financial markets.\n Keep your answer concise, informative, and easy to understand.\n \n Question: $question\n \"\"\".trimIndent()\n \n return sendMessage(contextualPrompt)\n }\n \n /**\n * Get market analysis for a currency pair\n */\n suspend fun analyzeCurrencyPair(\n fromCurrency: String,\n toCurrency: String,\n currentRate: Double\n ): Result<String> {\n val prompt = \"\"\"\n Provide a brief analysis of the $fromCurrency/$toCurrency currency pair.\n Current exchange rate: 1 $fromCurrency = $currentRate $toCurrency\n \n Include:\n 1. Brief overview of factors affecting this pair\n 2. Recent trends (general market knowledge)\n 3. Key economic indicators to watch\n \n Keep it concise (2-3 short paragraphs).\n \"\"\".trimIndent()\n \n return sendMessage(prompt)\n }\n \n /**\n * Get general forex tips\n */\n suspend fun getForexTips(): Result<String> {\n val prompt = \"\"\"\n Provide 5 important tips for someone interested in forex trading or currency exchange.\n Keep each tip concise and practical.\n \"\"\".trimIndent()\n \n return sendMessage(prompt)\n }\n}\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_01Wt3vhN8rucNqWxZKJecjXM","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

```
@@ -1,1 +1,92 @@
+package com.example.forexcalculatorapp.data
 
+import com.google.ai.client.generativeai.GenerativeModel
+import com.google.ai.client.generativeai.type.content
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.flow
+
+class GeminiService(apiKey: String) {
+
+ private val generativeModel = GenerativeModel(
+ modelName = "gemini-1.5-flash",
+ apiKey = apiKey
+ )
+
+ /**
+ * Send a message to Gemini and get a response
+ */
+ suspend fun sendMessage(prompt: String): Result<String> {
+ return try {
+ val response = generativeModel.generateContent(prompt)
+ val text = response.text ?: "No response received"
+ Result.success(text)
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ Result.failure(e)
+ }
+ }
+
+ /**
+ * Send a message with streaming response
+ */
+ fun sendMessageStream(prompt: String): Flow<String> = flow {
+ try {
+ val response = generativeModel.generateContentStream(prompt)
+ response.collect { chunk ->
+ chunk.text?.let { emit(it) }
+ }
+ } catch (e: Exception) {
+ emit("Error: ${e.message}")
+ }
+ }
+
+ /**
+ * Send a forex-specific query with context
+ */
+ suspend fun askForexQuestion(question: String): Result<String> {
+ val contextualPrompt = """
+ You are a helpful forex and financial market assistant. 
+ Answer the following question about forex, currency exchange, or financial markets.
+ Keep your answer concise, informative, and easy to understand.
+ 
+ Question: $question
+ """.trimIndent()
+
+ return sendMessage(contextualPrompt)
+ }
+
+ /**
+ * Get market analysis for a currency pair
+ */
+ suspend fun analyzeCurrencyPair(
+ fromCurrency: String,
+ toCurrency: String,
+ currentRate: Double
+ ): Result<String> {
+ val prompt = """
+ Provide a brief analysis of the $fromCurrency/$toCurrency currency pair.
+ Current exchange rate: 1 $fromCurrency = $currentRate $toCurrency
+ 
+ Include:
+ 1. Brief overview of factors affecting this pair
+ 2. Recent trends (general market knowledge)
+ 3. Key economic indicators to watch
+ 
+ Keep it concise (2-3 short paragraphs).
+ """.trimIndent()
+
+ return sendMessage(prompt)
+ }
+
+ /**
+ * Get general forex tips
+ */
+ suspend fun getForexTips(): Result<String> {
+ val prompt = """
+ Provide 5 important tips for someone interested in forex trading or currency exchange.
+ Keep each tip concise and practical.
+ """.trimIndent()
+
+ return sendMessage(prompt)
+ }
+}
+

@@ -1,1 +1,154 @@
+package com.example.forexcalculatorapp.viewmodel
 
+import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
+import androidx.lifecycle.viewModelScope
+import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.data.GeminiService
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.MutableStateFlow
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.StateFlow
+import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.asStateFlow
+import kotlinx.coroutines.launch
+
+data class ChatMessage(
+ val text: String,
+ val isUser: Boolean,
+ val timestamp: Long = System.currentTimeMillis()
+)
+
+data class GeminiUiState(
+ val messages: List<ChatMessage> = emptyList(),
+ val isLoading: Boolean = false,
+ val error: String? = null,
+ val currentInput: String = ""
+)
+
+class GeminiViewModel(private val apiKey: String) : ViewModel() {
+
+ private val geminiService = GeminiService(apiKey)
+
+ private val _uiState = MutableStateFlow(GeminiUiState())
+ val uiState: StateFlow<GeminiUiState> = _uiState.asStateFlow()
+
+ /**
+ * Send a message to Gemini
+ */
+ fun sendMessage(message: String) {
+ if (message.isBlank()) return
+
+ // Add user message
+ val userMessage = ChatMessage(text = message, isUser = true)
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
+ messages = _uiState.value.messages + userMessage,
+ isLoading = true,
+ error = null,
+ currentInput = ""
+ )
+
+ viewModelScope.launch {
+ val result = geminiService.askForexQuestion(message)
+
+ result.fold(
+ onSuccess = { response ->
+ val aiMessage = ChatMessage(text = response, isUser = false)
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
+ messages = _uiState.value.messages + aiMessage,
+ isLoading = false
+ )
+ },
+ onFailure = { exception ->
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
+ isLoading = false,
+ error = exception.message ?: "Unknown error occurred"
+ )
+ }
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ /**
+ * Get analysis for a currency pair
+ */
+ fun analyzeCurrencyPair(from: String, to: String, rate: Double) {
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
+ isLoading = true,
+ error = null
+ )
+
+ viewModelScope.launch {
+ val result = geminiService.analyzeCurrencyPair(from, to, rate)
+
+ result.fold(
+ onSuccess = { response ->
+ val aiMessage = ChatMessage(
+ text = " Analysis for $from/$to:\n\n$response",
+ isUser = false
+ )
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
+ messages = _uiState.value.messages + aiMessage,
+ isLoading = false
+ )
+ },
+ onFailure = { exception ->
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
+ isLoading = false,
+ error = exception.message ?: "Failed to get analysis"
+ )
+ }
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ /**
+ * Get general forex tips
+ */
+ fun getForexTips() {
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
+ isLoading = true,
+ error = null
+ )
+
+ viewModelScope.launch {
+ val result = geminiService.getForexTips()
+
+ result.fold(
+ onSuccess = { response ->
+ val aiMessage = ChatMessage(
+ text = " Forex Tips:\n\n$response",
+ isUser = false
+ )
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
+ messages = _uiState.value.messages + aiMessage,
+ isLoading = false
+ )
+ },
+ onFailure = { exception ->
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(
+ isLoading = false,
+ error = exception.message ?: "Failed to get tips"
+ )
+ }
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ /**
+ * Update the current input text
+ */
+ fun updateInput(text: String) {
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(currentInput = text)
+ }
+
+ /**
+ * Clear error message
+ */
+ fun clearError() {
+ _uiState.value = _uiState.value.copy(error = null)
+ }
+
+ /**
+ * Clear all messages
+ */
+ fun clearMessages() {
+ _uiState.value = GeminiUiState()
+ }
+}
+

+package com.example.forexcalculatorapp.ui.screens
 
+import androidx.compose.animation.AnimatedVisibility
+import androidx.compose.animation.fadeIn
+import androidx.compose.animation.fadeOut
+import androidx.compose.foundation.background
+import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*
+import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.LazyColumn
+import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.items
+import androidx.compose.foundation.lazy.rememberLazyListState
+import androidx.compose.foundation.shape.RoundedCornerShape
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.automirrored.filled.Send
+import androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.*
+import androidx.compose.material3.*
+import androidx.compose.runtime.*
+import androidx.compose.ui.Alignment
+import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
+import androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color
+import androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight
+import androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp
+import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.viewmodel.ChatMessage
+import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.viewmodel.GeminiViewModel
+import kotlinx.coroutines.launch
+
+@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
+@Composable
+fun GeminiChatScreen(
+ viewModel: GeminiViewModel,
+ onBackPressed: () -> Unit,
+ fromCurrency: String? = null,
+ toCurrency: String? = null,
+ currentRate: Double? = null
+) {
+ val uiState by viewModel.uiState.collectAsState()
+ val listState = rememberLazyListState()
+ val coroutineScope = rememberCoroutineScope()
+
+ // Auto-scroll to bottom when new messages arrive
+ LaunchedEffect(uiState.messages.size) {
+ if (uiState.messages.isNotEmpty()) {
+ coroutineScope.launch {
+ listState.animateScrollToItem(uiState.messages.size - 1)
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ Scaffold(
+ topBar = {
+ TopAppBar(
+ title = {
+ Column {
+ Text("Gemini AI Assistant")
+ Text(
+ "Forex & Market Insights",
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall,
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
+ )
+ }
+ },
+ navigationIcon = {
+ IconButton(onClick = onBackPressed) {
+ Icon(Icons.Default.ArrowBack, contentDescription = "Back")
+ }
+ },
+ actions = {
+ IconButton(onClick = { viewModel.clearMessages() }) {
+ Icon(Icons.Default.Delete, contentDescription = "Clear chat")
+ }
+ },
+ colors = TopAppBarDefaults.topAppBarColors(
+ containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primaryContainer,
+ titleContentColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimaryContainer
+ )
+ )
+ }
+ ) { paddingValues ->
+ Column(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxSize()
+ .padding(paddingValues)
+ ) {
+ // Quick action buttons
+ if (uiState.messages.isEmpty()) {
+ QuickActions(
+ viewModel = viewModel,
+ fromCurrency = fromCurrency,
+ toCurrency = toCurrency,
+ currentRate = currentRate
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Messages list
+ LazyColumn(
+ state = listState,
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .weight(1f)
+ .fillMaxWidth(),
+ contentPadding = PaddingValues(16.dp),
+ verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(12.dp)
+ ) {
+ if (uiState.messages.isEmpty()) {
+ item {
+ WelcomeMessage()
+ }
+ }
+
+ items(uiState.messages) { message ->
+ ChatMessageBubble(message)
+ }
+
+ if (uiState.isLoading) {
+ item {
+ LoadingIndicator()
+ }
+ }
+ }
+
+ // Error display
+ AnimatedVisibility(
+ visible = uiState.error != null,
+ enter = fadeIn(),
+ exit = fadeOut()
+ ) {
+ uiState.error?.let { error ->
+ ErrorBanner(
+ error = error,
+ onDismiss = { viewModel.clearError() }
+ )
+ }
+ }
+
+ // Input field
+ MessageInputField(
+ value = uiState.currentInput,
+ onValueChange = { viewModel.updateInput(it) },
+ onSend = { viewModel.sendMessage(uiState.currentInput) },
+ enabled = !uiState.isLoading
+ )
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+fun WelcomeMessage() {
+ Card(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
+ containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primaryContainer.copy(alpha = 0.5f)
+ )
+ ) {
+ Column(
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(20.dp),
+ verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Star,
+ contentDescription = null,
+ tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
+ )
+ Text(
+ "Welcome to Gemini AI!",
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleMedium,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold
+ )
+ }
+ Text(
+ "Ask me anything about forex, currency exchange, market trends, or financial advice!",
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
+ )
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+fun QuickActions(
+ viewModel: GeminiViewModel,
+ fromCurrency: String?,
+ toCurrency: String?,
+ currentRate: Double?
+) {
+ Column(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .padding(16.dp),
+ verticalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
+ ) {
+ Text(
+ "Quick Actions:",
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleSmall,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
+ )
+
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
+ ) {
+ // Analyze currency pair button (if currencies available)
+ if (fromCurrency != null && toCurrency != null && currentRate != null) {
+ FilterChip(
+ selected = false,
+ onClick = {
+ viewModel.analyzeCurrencyPair(fromCurrency, toCurrency, currentRate)
+ },
+ label = { Text("Analyze $fromCurrency/$toCurrency") },
+ leadingIcon = {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Info,
+ contentDescription = null,
+ modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp)
+ )
+ },
+ modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Get forex tips button
+ FilterChip(
+ selected = false,
+ onClick = { viewModel.getForexTips() },
+ label = { Text("Forex Tips") },
+ leadingIcon = {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Star,
+ contentDescription = null,
+ modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp)
+ )
+ },
+ modifier = Modifier.weight(1f)
+ )
+ }
+
+ // Example questions
+ Text(
+ "Example questions:",
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.labelSmall,
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant,
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(top = 8.dp)
+ )
+
+ listOf(
+ "What factors affect exchange rates?",
+ "How does inflation impact currency?",
+ "Best time to exchange currency?"
+ ).forEach { question ->
+ SuggestionChip(
+ onClick = { viewModel.sendMessage(question) },
+ label = { Text(question, style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall) }
+ )
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+fun ChatMessageBubble(message: ChatMessage) {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ horizontalArrangement = if (message.isUser) Arrangement.End else Arrangement.Start
+ ) {
+ Card(
+ modifier = Modifier.widthIn(max = 300.dp),
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(
+ topStart = 16.dp,
+ topEnd = 16.dp,
+ bottomStart = if (message.isUser) 16.dp else 4.dp,
+ bottomEnd = if (message.isUser) 4.dp else 16.dp
+ ),
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
+ containerColor = if (message.isUser)
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primaryContainer
+ else
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.secondaryContainer
+ )
+ ) {
+ Column(
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(12.dp)
+ ) {
+ if (!message.isUser) {
+ Row(
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically,
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(4.dp)
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Star,
+ contentDescription = null,
+ modifier = Modifier.size(16.dp),
+ tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
+ )
+ Text(
+ "Gemini",
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.labelSmall,
+ fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary
+ )
+ }
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(4.dp))
+ }
+
+ Text(
+ text = message.text,
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
+ color = if (message.isUser)
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimaryContainer
+ else
+ MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSecondaryContainer
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+fun LoadingIndicator() {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.Start
+ ) {
+ Card(
+ modifier = Modifier.widthIn(max = 100.dp),
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
+ containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.secondaryContainer
+ )
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(16.dp),
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp),
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
+ ) {
+ CircularProgressIndicator(
+ modifier = Modifier.size(20.dp),
+ strokeWidth = 2.dp
+ )
+ Text("Thinking...", style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall)
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+fun ErrorBanner(error: String, onDismiss: () -> Unit) {
+ Card(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .fillMaxWidth()
+ .padding(horizontal = 16.dp, vertical = 8.dp),
+ colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
+ containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.errorContainer
+ )
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier.padding(12.dp),
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Warning,
+ contentDescription = null,
+ tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onErrorContainer
+ )
+ Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(8.dp))
+ Text(
+ error,
+ modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
+ style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall,
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onErrorContainer
+ )
+ IconButton(onClick = onDismiss) {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.Default.Close,
+ contentDescription = "Dismiss",
+ tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onErrorContainer
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}
+
+@Composable
+fun MessageInputField(
+ value: String,
+ onValueChange: (String) -> Unit,
+ onSend: () -> Unit,
+ enabled: Boolean
+) {
+ Surface(
+ modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
+ shadowElevation = 8.dp,
+ color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.surface
+ ) {
+ Row(
+ modifier = Modifier
+ .padding(16.dp)
+ .fillMaxWidth(),
+ verticalAlignment = Alignment.Bottom,
+ horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.spacedBy(8.dp)
+ ) {
+ OutlinedTextField(
+ value = value,
+ onValueChange = onValueChange,
+ modifier = Modifier.weight(1f),
+ placeholder = { Text("Ask me anything...") },
+ enabled = enabled,
+ maxLines = 4,
+ shape = RoundedCornerShape(24.dp)
+ )
+
+ FilledIconButton(
+ onClick = onSend,
+ enabled = enabled && value.isNotBlank(),
+ modifier = Modifier.size(56.dp)
+ ) {
+ Icon(
+ Icons.AutoMirrored.Filled.Send,
+ contentDescription = "Send"
+ )
+ }
+ }
+ }
+}

@OptIn(ExperimentalMaterial3Api::class)
@Composable
fun MainScreen(
 selectedStock: StockWithPrice? = null,
 onBrowseStocksClick: () -> Unit = {},
 onForexMarketClick: () -> Unit = {},
 onStockUsed: () -> Unit = {},
 viewModel: MainViewModel = viewModel()
) {
 val uiState by viewModel.uiState.collectAsStateWithLifecycle()
 val focusRequester = remember { FocusRequester() }

 // Handle selected stock from stock list
 LaunchedEffect(selectedStock) {
 selectedStock?.let { stock ->
 viewModel.applyStockFromList(stock)
 onStockUsed()
 }
 }

 LaunchedEffect(Unit) {
 focusRequester.requestFocus()
 }

 Scaffold(
 topBar = {
 TopAppBar(
 title = {
 Column {
 Text(
 "SimpleConvert",
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold
 )
 if (uiState.lastUpdateTime > 0) {
 Text(
 text = "Last updated: ${formatUpdateTime(uiState.lastUpdateTime)}",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.labelSmall,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimaryContainer.copy(alpha = 0.7f)
 )
 }
 }
 },
 actions = {
 // Auto-refresh indicator
 if (uiState.isAutoRefreshEnabled) {
 Icon(
 Icons.Default.Update,
 contentDescription = "Auto-refresh enabled",
 tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary,
 modifier = Modifier.padding(end = 8.dp)
 )
 }
 // Chart toggle button
 IconButton(onClick = { viewModel.toggleChart() }) {
 Icon(
 if (uiState.showChart) Icons.Default.ShowChart else Icons.Default.SwapVert,
 contentDescription = "Toggle chart",
 tint = if (uiState.showChart) MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary else MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSurfaceVariant
 )
 }
 },
 colors = TopAppBarDefaults.topAppBarColors(
 containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primaryContainer,
 titleContentColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onPrimaryContainer
 )
 )
 }
 ) { paddingValues ->
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxSize()
 .padding(paddingValues)
 .padding(horizontal = 20.dp)
 .verticalScroll(rememberScrollState()),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(24.dp))

 // Stock Symbol Search
 OutlinedTextField(
 value = uiState.stockSymbol,
 onValueChange = { viewModel.onStockSymbolChanged(it) },
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 label = { Text("Stock Symbol (e.g., AAPL, TSLA)") },
 placeholder = { Text("Enter stock symbol") },
 singleLine = true,
 isError = uiState.stockErrorMessage != null,
 supportingText = {
 if (uiState.stockErrorMessage != null) {
 Text(
 text = uiState.stockErrorMessage!!,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.error
 )
 } else if (uiState.stockName.isNotEmpty()) {
 Text(
 text = uiState.stockName,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primary,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 )
 }
 },
 shape = MaterialTheme.shapes.large,
 trailingIcon = {
 if (uiState.isLoadingStock) {
 CircularProgressIndicator(
 modifier = Modifier.size(24.dp),
 strokeWidth = 2.dp
 )
 }
 }
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))

 // Amount Input (Price per share)
 OutlinedTextField(
 value = uiState.amount,
 onValueChange = { viewModel.onAmountChanged(it) },
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .focusRequester(focusRequester),
 label = { Text("Price per Share") },
 placeholder = { Text("Enter price") },
 keyboardOptions = KeyboardOptions(keyboardType = KeyboardType.Decimal),
 singleLine = true,
 textStyle = LocalTextStyle.current.copy(
 fontSize = 24.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 ),
 shape = MaterialTheme.shapes.large
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))

 // Number of Shares Input
 OutlinedTextField(
 value = uiState.numberOfShares,
 onValueChange = { viewModel.onNumberOfSharesChanged(it) },
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 label = { Text("Number of Shares") },
 placeholder = { Text("Enter quantity") },
 keyboardOptions = KeyboardOptions(keyboardType = KeyboardType.Decimal),
 singleLine = true,
 textStyle = LocalTextStyle.current.copy(
 fontSize = 20.sp,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Medium
 ),
 shape = MaterialTheme.shapes.large
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(32.dp))

 // From Currency Card
 CurrencyCard(
 label = "From",
 currency = uiState.fromCurrency,
 onClick = { viewModel.showCurrencyPicker(true) }
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))

 // Swap Button
 FloatingActionButton(
 onClick = { viewModel.onSwapCurrencies() },
 modifier = Modifier.size(56.dp),
 containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.secondary
 ) {
 Icon(
 Icons.Default.SwapVert,
 contentDescription = "Swap currencies",
 tint = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSecondary
 )
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))

 // To Currency Card
 CurrencyCard(
 label = "To",
 currency = uiState.toCurrency,
 onClick = { viewModel.showCurrencyPicker(false) }
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(32.dp))

 // Conversion Result
 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 shape = MaterialTheme.shapes.large,
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.tertiaryContainer
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 4.dp)
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(24.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "Price per Share",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.labelLarge,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onTertiaryContainer.copy(alpha = 0.7f)
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(12.dp))

 // Result with shimmer effect
 AnimatedContent(
 targetState = uiState.isLoading,
 transitionSpec = { fadeIn() togetherWith fadeOut() },
 label = "result_animation"
 ) { isLoading ->
 if (isLoading) {
 ShimmerEffect(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .height(60.dp)
 )
 } else {
 Column(
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally,
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth()
 ) {
 Text(
 text = if (uiState.convertedAmount.isNotEmpty()) {
 "${uiState.convertedAmount} ${uiState.toCurrency.code}"
 } else {
 "Enter price"
 },
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.displaySmall,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onTertiaryContainer,
 textAlign = TextAlign.Center
 )

 if (uiState.inverseRateText.isNotEmpty()) {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))
 Text(
 text = uiState.inverseRateText,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodyMedium,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onTertiaryContainer.copy(
 alpha = 0.7f
 ),
 textAlign = TextAlign.Center
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }

 // Error message
 if (uiState.errorMessage != null) {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))
 Text(
 text = uiState.errorMessage!!,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.bodySmall,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.error,
 textAlign = TextAlign.Center
 )
 }
 }
 }

 if (uiState.showChart && uiState.rateHistory.isNotEmpty()) {
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))
 CurrencyExchangeChart(
 fromCurrency = uiState.fromCurrency.code,
 toCurrency = uiState.toCurrency.code,
 rateHistory = uiState.rateHistory,
 currentRate = uiState.currentRate,
 rateChange = uiState.rateChange
 )
 }

 // Total Cost Card (shown when shares are entered)
 if (uiState.numberOfShares.isNotEmpty() &&
 uiState.totalCostInFrom.isNotEmpty() &&
 uiState.totalCostInTo.isNotEmpty()
 ) {

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))

 Card(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 shape = MaterialTheme.shapes.large,
 colors = CardDefaults.cardColors(
 containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.secondaryContainer
 ),
 elevation = CardDefaults.cardElevation(defaultElevation = 4.dp)
 ) {
 Column(
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .padding(24.dp),
 horizontalAlignment = Alignment.CenterHorizontally
 ) {
 Text(
 text = "Total Cost for ${uiState.numberOfShares} Shares",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleMedium,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSecondaryContainer
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(16.dp))

 // Total in From Currency
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Text(
 text = uiState.fromCurrency.code,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleLarge,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.SemiBold,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSecondaryContainer
 )
 Text(
 text = uiState.totalCostInFrom,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.headlineMedium,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSecondaryContainer
 )
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))

 HorizontalDivider(
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSecondaryContainer.copy(alpha = 0.3f)
 )

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))

 // Total in To Currency
 Row(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),
 horizontalArrangement = Arrangement.SpaceBetween,
 verticalAlignment = Alignment.CenterVertically
 ) {
 Text(
 text = uiState.toCurrency.code,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleLarge,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.SemiBold,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSecondaryContainer
 )
 Text(
 text = uiState.totalCostInTo,
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.headlineMedium,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold,
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.onSecondaryContainer
 )
 }
 }
 }
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(32.dp))

 Button(
 onClick = onForexMarketClick,
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .height(56.dp),
 colors = ButtonDefaults.buttonColors(
 containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primaryContainer
 )
 ) {
 Icon(
 Icons.Default.TrendingUp,
 contentDescription = null,
 modifier = Modifier.size(24.dp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(8.dp))
 Text(
 "Forex Market",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleMedium,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold
 )
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(8.dp))

 Button(
 onClick = onBrowseStocksClick,
 modifier = Modifier
 .fillMaxWidth()
 .height(56.dp),
 colors = ButtonDefaults.buttonColors(
 containerColor = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.primaryContainer
 )
 ) {
 Icon(
 Icons.Default.List,
 contentDescription = null,
 modifier = Modifier.size(24.dp)
 )
 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.width(8.dp))
 Text(
 "Browse All Stocks with Prices",
 style = MaterialTheme.typography.titleMedium,
 fontWeight = FontWeight.Bold
 )
 }

 Spacer(modifier = Modifier.height(24.dp))
 }

 // Currency Picker Modal
 CurrencyPickerModal(
 visible = uiState.showCurrencyPicker,
 currencies = uiState.availableCurrencies,
 onCurrencySelected = { currency ->
 if (uiState.isPickingFromCurrency) {
 viewModel.onFromCurrencySelected(currency)
 } else {
 viewModel.onToCurrencySelected(currency)
 }
 },
 onDismiss = { viewModel.hideCurrencyPicker() }
 )

 // Stock Search Modal
 StockSearchModal(
 visible = uiState.showStockSearch,
 searchResults = uiState.stockSearchResults,
 onStockSelected = { stock ->
 viewModel.onStockSelected(stock)
 },
 onDismiss = { viewModel.hideStockSearch() }
 )
 }
}

fun formatUpdateTime(time: Long): String {
 val formatter = SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", Locale.getDefault())
 return formatter.format(Date(time))
}

GeminiViewModel (`viewmodel/GeminiViewModel.kt`)\n- Manages chat state and UI logic\n- Handles message history\n- Provides loading states and error handling\n- Methods:\n - `sendMessage()`: Send user message\n - `analyzeCurrencyPair()`: Request analysis\n - `getForexTips()`: Request tips\n - `clearMessages()`: Clear chat history\n\n#### 3. minute**\n- **1,500 requests per day**\n- **1 million tokens per month**\n\n### Best Practices\n\n1. **Cache Responses**: Save common questions and their answers\n2. **Debounce Input**: Don't send requests on every keystroke\n3. **Handle Errors Gracefully**: Show helpful error messages\n4. **Rate Limit Handling**: Implement exponential backoff\n5. **User Education**: Inform users about what questions work best\n\n### Error Handling\n\nThe app handles common errors:\n- Network failures\n- API key issues\n- Rate limiting\n- Invalid responses\n\nError messages appear in a dismissible banner Ensure there are no extra spaces or quotes.\n\n### Issue: \"Network Error\"\n**Solution**: \n- Check internet connection\n- Verify `INTERNET` permission in `AndroidManifest.xml`\n- Check if you're behind a proxy or firewall\n\n### Issue: \"Rate Limit Exceeded\"\n**Solution**: \n- Wait a few minutes before trying again\n- Implement request caching\n- Consider upgrading to a paid plan for higher limits\n\n### Issue: App Crashes on Launch\n**Solution**: \n- Ensure you've synced Gradle after adding dependencies\n- Check that the Gemini SDK is properly downloaded\n- Clean and rebuild the project\n\n## Future Enhancements\n\nPotential improvements:\n- [ ] Conversation history persistence\n- [ ] Streaming responses (word-by-word display)\n- [ ] Voice input support\n- [ ] Multi-language support\n- [ ] Favorite/bookmark useful responses\n- [ ] Share chat conversations\n- [ ] Integration with currency converter (e.g., \"Convert 100 USD to EUR\")\n- [ ] Price predictions and forecasts\n- [ ] News integration for market context\n\n## Security Considerations\n\n **Important Security Notes**:\n\n1. **Never commit API keys to version control**\n - Add `local.properties` to `.gitignore`\n - Use environment variables in CI/CD\n\n2. **Implement key rotation**\n - Regularly regenerate API keys\n - Use remote config for key updates\n\n3. **Validate and sanitize inputs**\n - Already implemented in the app\n - Prevents injection attacks\n\n4. **Monitor API usage**\n - Check Google AI Studio dashboard regularly\n - Set up alerts for unusual activity\n\n## Resources\n\n- [Gemini API Documentation](https://ai.google.dev/)\n- [Google AI Studio](https://makersuite.google.com/)\n- [Gemini SDK for Android](https://github.com/google/generative-ai-android)\n- [API Pricing & Limits](https://ai.google.dev/pricing)\n\n## Support\n\nFor issues related to:\n- **App functionality**: Check the main README.md\n- **Gemini API**: Visit [Google AI Support](https://ai.google.dev/support)\n- **Android development**: Refer to [Android Developer Guides](https://developer.android.com/)\n\n---\n\n**Version**: 1.0 \n**Last Updated**: 2024 \n**Gemini Model**: gemini-1.5-flash\n"}"}}]},{"role":"tool","name":"edit_file","tool_call_id":"toolu_01PyFmRUoUNHrAEkrfn3Yncs","content":"The apply model made the following changes to the file:

@@ -1,1 +1,346 @@
+# Gemini AI Integration Guide
 
+## Overview
+
+The forex calculator app now includes **Gemini AI** integration, providing users with intelligent
+forex market insights, currency pair analysis, and answers to financial questions. This feature uses
+Google's free Gemini API to deliver AI-powered assistance directly within the app.
+
+## Features
+
+### AI-Powered Chat Interface
+
+- **Natural Language Conversations**: Ask Gemini anything about forex, currencies, and financial
+ markets
+- **Context-Aware Responses**: Gemini understands forex-specific terminology and concepts
+- **Real-time Streaming**: Responses appear dynamically as they're generated
+
+### Smart Analysis Tools
+
+- **Currency Pair Analysis**: Get instant analysis of your selected currency pair
+ - Overview of factors affecting the exchange rate
+ - Recent market trends
+ - Key economic indicators to watch
+- **Forex Trading Tips**: Request general forex trading advice and best practices
+- **Quick Actions**: One-tap access to common queries
+
+### Modern Chat UI
+
+- **Material 3 Design**: Beautiful, modern interface that matches the app theme
+- **Chat Bubbles**: Distinct styling for user messages vs. AI responses
+- **Welcome Screen**: Helpful introduction with example questions
+- **Loading Indicators**: Visual feedback while Gemini is thinking
+- **Error Handling**: Graceful error messages with retry options
+
+## Getting Started
+
+### 1. Obtain a Gemini API Key
+
+1. Visit [Google AI Studio](https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey)
+2. Sign in with your Google account
+3. Click **"Get API Key"** or **"Create API Key"**
+4. Copy your new API key
+
+**Note**: The Gemini API is **free** to use within generous rate limits:
+
+- 60 requests per minute
+- 1,500 requests per day
+- 1 million tokens per month
+
+### 2. Add Your API Key to the App
+
+Open `MainActivity.kt` and replace `YOUR_API_KEY_HERE` with your actual API key:
+
+```kotlin
+class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
+ // Store your Gemini API key here
+ private val GEMINI_API_KEY = "YOUR_ACTUAL_API_KEY_HERE"
+ 
+ // ... rest of the code
+}
+```
+
+**Security Note**: For production apps, store API keys securely using:
+
+- Android Keystore
+- Environment variables
+- BuildConfig fields with local.properties
+- Remote config services
+
+### 3. Access the Gemini Chat
+
+1. Launch the app
+2. On the main screen, tap the **"Gemini Chat"** button (with chat icon)
+3. Start asking questions!
+
+## Usage Examples
+
+### Quick Actions
+
+When you first open the Gemini chat, you'll see quick action buttons:
+
+- **Analyze [Currency Pair]**: Tap to get instant analysis of your currently selected currencies
+- **Forex Tips**: Get 5 practical tips for forex trading
+- **Example Questions**: Tap any suggested question to start
+
+### Example Questions
+
+**Exchange Rate Fundamentals:**
+
+- "What factors affect exchange rates?"
+- "How does inflation impact currency values?"
+- "Why do currencies fluctuate?"
+
+**Trading & Strategy:**
+
+- "What's the best time to exchange currency?"
+- "How do interest rates affect forex?"
+- "What is a pip in forex trading?"
+
+**Specific Currency Pairs:**
+
+- "What affects the USD/EUR exchange rate?"
+- "Why is the Japanese Yen considered a safe haven?"
+- "How does oil price affect the Canadian Dollar?"
+
+**Market Analysis:**
+
+- "What economic indicators should I watch for EUR/USD?"
+- "How does Brexit affect GBP exchange rates?"
+- "What causes currency volatility?"
+
+## Technical Implementation
+
+### Architecture
+
+```
+MainActivity
+ ForexCalculatorApp
+ MainScreen (with Gemini Chat button)
+ GeminiChatScreen
+ GeminiViewModel
+ GeminiService
+ Gemini SDK
+```
+
+### Key Components
+
+#### 1. GeminiService (`data/GeminiService.kt`)
+
+- Wrapper around Google's Generative AI SDK
+- Handles API communication
+- Provides specialized methods:
+ - `sendMessage()`: General queries
+ - `askForexQuestion()`: Forex-specific questions with context
+ - `analyzeCurrencyPair()`: Currency pair analysis
+ - `getForexTips()`: Trading tips
+
+#### 2. GeminiViewModel (`viewmodel/GeminiViewModel.kt`)
+
+- Manages chat state and UI logic
+- Handles message history
+- Provides loading states and error handling
+- Methods:
+ - `sendMessage()`: Send user message
+ - `analyzeCurrencyPair()`: Request analysis
+ - `getForexTips()`: Request tips
+ - `clearMessages()`: Clear chat history
+
+#### 3. GeminiChatScreen (`ui/screens/GeminiChatScreen.kt`)
+
+- Complete chat UI implementation
+- Auto-scrolling message list
+- Input field with send button
+- Quick action chips
+- Welcome screen and suggestions
+
+### Data Flow
+
+```
+User Input ViewModel GeminiService Gemini API
+ 
+ Update UI State
+ 
+ Render Response
+```
+
+## Customization
+
+### Modify AI Behavior
+
+Edit the prompts in `GeminiService.kt`:
+
+```kotlin
+suspend fun askForexQuestion(question: String): Result<String> {
+ val contextualPrompt = """
+ You are a helpful forex and financial market assistant. 
+ Answer the following question about forex, currency exchange, or financial markets.
+ Keep your answer concise, informative, and easy to understand.
+ 
+ Question: $question
+ """.trimIndent()
+ 
+ return sendMessage(contextualPrompt)
+}
+```
+
+### Change AI Model
+
+By default, the app uses `gemini-1.5-flash` (fastest, free):
+
+```kotlin
+private val generativeModel = GenerativeModel(
+ modelName = "gemini-1.5-flash",
+ apiKey = apiKey
+)
+```
+
+Other available models:
+
+- `gemini-1.5-pro`: More capable but slower
+- `gemini-pro`: Previous generation
+
+### Add Safety Settings
+
+```kotlin
+private val generativeModel = GenerativeModel(
+ modelName = "gemini-1.5-flash",
+ apiKey = apiKey,
+ safetySettings = listOf(
+ SafetySetting(HarmCategory.HARASSMENT, BlockThreshold.MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE),
+ SafetySetting(HarmCategory.HATE_SPEECH, BlockThreshold.MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE)
+ )
+)
+```
+
+## API Limits & Best Practices
+
+### Free Tier Limits
+
+- **60 requests per minute**
+- **1,500 requests per day**
+- **1 million tokens per month**
+
+### Best Practices
+
+1. **Cache Responses**: Save common questions and their answers
+2. **Debounce Input**: Don't send requests on every keystroke
+3. **Handle Errors Gracefully**: Show helpful error messages
+4. **Rate Limit Handling**: Implement exponential backoff
+5. **User Education**: Inform users about what questions work best
+
+### Error Handling
+
+The app handles common errors:
+
+- Network failures
+- API key issues
+- Rate limiting
+- Invalid responses
+
+Error messages appear in a dismissible banner at the bottom of the chat.
+
+## Dependencies
+
+Added to `gradle/libs.versions.toml`:
+
+```toml
+[versions]
+gemini = "0.9.0"
+
+[libraries]
+gemini = { group = "com.google.ai.client.generativeai", name = "generativeai", version.ref = "gemini" }
+```
+
+Added to `app/build.gradle.kts`:
+
+```kotlin
+implementation(libs.gemini)
+```
+
+## Troubleshooting
+
+### Issue: "API Key Not Valid"
+
+**Solution**: Double-check your API key in `MainActivity.kt`. Ensure there are no extra spaces or
+quotes.
+
+### Issue: "Network Error"
+
+**Solution**:
+
+- Check internet connection
+- Verify `INTERNET` permission in `AndroidManifest.xml`
+- Check if you're behind a proxy or firewall
+
+### Issue: "Rate Limit Exceeded"
+
+**Solution**:
+
+- Wait a few minutes before trying again
+- Implement request caching
+- Consider upgrading to a paid plan for higher limits
+
+### Issue: App Crashes on Launch
+
+**Solution**:
+
+- Ensure you've synced Gradle after adding dependencies
+- Check that the Gemini SDK is properly downloaded
+- Clean and rebuild the project
+
+## Future Enhancements
+
+Potential improvements:
+
+- [ ] Conversation history persistence
+- [ ] Streaming responses (word-by-word display)
+- [ ] Voice input support
+- [ ] Multi-language support
+- [ ] Favorite/bookmark useful responses
+- [ ] Share chat conversations
+- [ ] Integration with currency converter (e.g., "Convert 100 USD to EUR")
+- [ ] Price predictions and forecasts
+- [ ] News integration for market context
+
+## Security Considerations
+
+ **Important Security Notes**:
+
+1. **Never commit API keys to version control**
+ - Add `local.properties` to `.gitignore`
+ - Use environment variables in CI/CD
+
+2. **Implement key rotation**
+ - Regularly regenerate API keys
+ - Use remote config for key updates
+
+3. **Validate and sanitize inputs**
+ - Already implemented in the app
+ - Prevents injection attacks
+
+4. **Monitor API usage**
+ - Check Google AI Studio dashboard regularly
+ - Set up alerts for unusual activity
+
+## Resources
+
+- [Gemini API Documentation](https://ai.google.dev/)
+- [Google AI Studio](https://makersuite.google.com/)
+- [Gemini SDK for Android](https://github.com/google/generative-ai-android)
+- [API Pricing & Limits](https://ai.google.dev/pricing)
+
+## Support

+For issues related to:
+
+- **App functionality**: Check the main README.md
+- **Gemini API**: Visit [Google AI Support](https://ai.google.dev/support)
+- **Android development**: Refer to [Android Developer Guides](https://developer.android.com/)
+

+# Quick Gemini Setup Guide
 
+## Get Started in 3 Minutes
+
+### Step 1: Get Your Free API Key
+
+1. Open [Google AI Studio](https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey) in your browser
+2. Sign in with your Google account
+3. Click **"Get API Key"** or **"Create API Key"**
+4. Click **"Create API key in new project"** (or select an existing project)
+5. Copy the generated API key (it looks like: `AIzaSyXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX`)
+
+### Step 2: Add API Key to Your App
+
+1. Open the project in Android Studio
+2. Navigate to: `app/src/main/java/com/example/forexcalculatorapp/MainActivity.kt`
+3. Find this line:
+ ```kotlin
+ private val GEMINI_API_KEY = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE"
+ ```
+4. Replace `YOUR_API_KEY_HERE` with your actual API key:
+ ```kotlin
+ private val GEMINI_API_KEY = "AIzaSyXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX"
+ ```
+5. Save the file
+
+### Step 3: Build and Run
+
+1. Click **Build > Make Project** (or press Ctrl+F9)
+2. Run the app on your device or emulator
+3. Tap the **"Gemini Chat"** button on the main screen
+4. Start chatting!
+
+## Try These First
+
+Once the chat opens, try these example questions:
+
+- "What factors affect exchange rates?"
+- "How does inflation impact currency?"
+- "Explain EUR/USD movements"
+- Tap **"Forex Tips"** for trading advice
+- Tap **"Analyze [Currency Pair]"** for instant analysis
+
+## Important Notes
+
+### API Key Security
+
+- **For Testing**: Hardcoding the key in `MainActivity.kt` is fine
+- **For Production**: Never commit API keys to Git! Use:
+ - `local.properties` (add to `.gitignore`)
+ - Environment variables
+ - Remote config services
+
+### Free Tier Limits
+
+Your free API key includes:
+
+- 60 requests per minute
+- 1,500 requests per day
+- 1 million tokens per month
+
+This is more than enough for personal testing and development!
+
+## Troubleshooting
+
+### Build Errors
+
+If you see build errors after adding the dependency:
+
+1. **Sync Gradle**: File > Sync Project with Gradle Files
+2. **Clean Build**: Build > Clean Project, then Build > Rebuild Project
+3. **Check Internet**: Ensure Gradle can download dependencies
+
+### "Invalid API Key" Error
+
+- Double-check there are no spaces or quotes around the key
+- Verify the key at [Google AI Studio](https://makersuite.google.com/)
+- Make sure you copied the entire key
+
+### App Crashes
+
+- Ensure you've synced Gradle after adding the Gemini dependency
+- Check that `INTERNET` permission is in `AndroidManifest.xml` (already included)
+- Try invalidating caches: File > Invalidate Caches > Invalidate and Restart
+
+## Next Steps
+
+- Read the [Complete Gemini Integration Guide](GEMINI_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md)
+- Explore the [Gemini API Documentation](https://ai.google.dev/)
+- Customize prompts in `GeminiService.kt`
+
+## Need Help?
+
+- **Gemini API Issues**: [Google AI Support](https://ai.google.dev/support)
+- **Android Issues**: Check the main [README.md](README.md)
+- **API Key Questions**: [Google AI Studio Help](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/api-key)
+
+---
+
+**That's it!** You're ready to use Gemini AI in your forex calculator app. 
+
```

+# Gemini Integration Summary
 
+## Overview
+
+Successfully integrated Google's **Gemini AI** into the Forex Calculator app using the free Gemini
+API. Users can now chat with an AI assistant about forex markets, get currency pair analysis, and
+receive trading tips.
+
+## What Was Added
+
+### 1. Dependencies
+
+- **Added Gemini SDK**: `com.google.ai.client.generativeai:generativeai:0.9.0`
+- **Updated files**:
+ - `gradle/libs.versions.toml`: Added Gemini version and library
+ - `app/build.gradle.kts`: Added Gemini implementation
+
+### 2. New Files Created
+
+#### Backend/Data Layer
+
+- **`GeminiService.kt`** (`data/`)
+ - Wrapper around Gemini SDK
+ - Methods for general queries, forex-specific questions, currency pair analysis
+ - Supports both single and streaming responses
+ - Error handling and Result type returns
+
+#### ViewModel Layer
+
+- **`GeminiViewModel.kt`** (`viewmodel/`)
+ - Manages chat state and message history
+ - Handles loading states and errors
+ - Methods: `sendMessage()`, `analyzeCurrencyPair()`, `getForexTips()`
+ - Uses StateFlow for reactive UI updates
+
+#### UI Layer
+
+- **`GeminiChatScreen.kt`** (`ui/screens/`)
+ - Complete Material 3 chat interface
+ - Features:
+ - Welcome screen with example questions
+ - Chat message bubbles (user vs AI)
+ - Quick action chips
+ - Auto-scrolling message list
+ - Loading indicators
+ - Error banner
+ - Input field with send button
+
+### 3. Modified Files
+
+#### `MainActivity.kt`
+
+- Added `GEMINI_API_KEY` constant (user needs to add their key)
+- Added `GeminiViewModel` initialization
+- Added navigation state for Gemini chat screen
+- Added `onGeminiChatClick` callback
+- Passes current currency context to Gemini screen
+
+#### `MainScreen.kt`
+
+- Added `onGeminiChatClick` parameter
+- Added "Gemini Chat" button with chat icon
+- Button placed alongside "Forex Market" and "Browse Stocks" buttons
+
+#### Documentation
+
+- **`GEMINI_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md`**: Complete technical guide
+- **`GEMINI_SETUP.md`**: Quick 3-minute setup guide
+- **`README.md`**: Updated with Gemini AI feature section
+
+## Features Implemented
+
+### Core Chat Functionality
+
+ Natural language question answering 
+ Forex-specific context in prompts 
+ Message history management 
+ Loading states and animations 
+ Error handling and display 
+ Clear chat functionality
+
+### Smart Features
+
+ Currency pair analysis (uses current selection) 
+ General forex tips 
+ Quick action buttons 
+ Example question suggestions 
+ Context-aware responses
+
+### UI/UX
+
+ Material 3 design 
+ Auto-scrolling chat 
+ Distinct user/AI message styling 
+ Welcome screen 
+ Loading indicators 
+ Error banners 
+ Smooth animations
+
+## File Structure
+
+```
+app/src/main/java/com/example/forexcalculatorapp/
+ MainActivity.kt [Modified] Added Gemini integration
+ data/
+ GeminiService.kt [New] Gemini API wrapper
+ viewmodel/
+ GeminiViewModel.kt [New] Chat state management
+ ui/screens/
+ MainScreen.kt [Modified] Added Gemini button
+ GeminiChatScreen.kt [New] Complete chat UI
+
+gradle/
+ libs.versions.toml [Modified] Added Gemini dependency
+
+app/
+ build.gradle.kts [Modified] Added Gemini dependency
+
+Documentation:
+ GEMINI_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md [New] Complete technical guide
+ GEMINI_SETUP.md [New] Quick setup guide
+ GEMINI_INTEGRATION_SUMMARY.md [New] This file
+ README.md [Modified] Added Gemini section
+```
+
+## How to Use
+
+### For Developers
+
+1. Get free API key from [Google AI Studio](https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey)
+2. Add key to `MainActivity.kt`:
+ ```kotlin
+ private val GEMINI_API_KEY = "YOUR_ACTUAL_KEY"
+ ```
+3. Sync and build project
+4. Run app and tap "Gemini Chat" button
+
+### For End Users
+
+1. Open app
+2. Tap "Gemini Chat" button on main screen
+3. Use quick actions or type questions
+4. Get instant AI-powered forex insights
+
+## Key Technical Decisions
+
+### Architecture
+
+- **MVVM Pattern**: Consistent with rest of the app
+- **StateFlow**: Reactive UI updates for chat messages
+- **Sealed Results**: Type-safe error handling
+- **Composable Functions**: Pure functions for each UI component
+
+### Gemini Configuration
+
+- **Model**: `gemini-1.5-flash` (fastest, free tier)
+- **Context**: Forex-specific prompts for better responses
+- **Error Handling**: Graceful fallbacks and user-friendly messages
+
+### UI Design
+
+- **Material 3**: Matches existing app theme
+- **Chat Bubbles**: WhatsApp-style message layout
+- **Colors**: Primary container for user, secondary for AI
+- **Icons**: Star icon for Gemini branding
+
+## Code Statistics
+
+- **New Kotlin Files**: 3 (GeminiService, GeminiViewModel, GeminiChatScreen)
+- **Modified Files**: 4 (MainActivity, MainScreen, build.gradle, libs.versions.toml)
+- **Total New Lines**: ~700 lines of Kotlin code
+- **Documentation**: 3 new markdown files
+- **Dependencies Added**: 1 (Gemini SDK)
+
+## Learning Resources
+
+All necessary documentation provided:
+
+- Quick setup guide (3 minutes)
+- Complete technical guide
+- Example questions and use cases
+- Troubleshooting section
+- Security best practices
+- Customization options
+
+## Security Notes
+
+ **API Key Management**
+
+- Current: Hardcoded in `MainActivity.kt` (OK for development)
+- Production: Should use `local.properties`, BuildConfig, or remote config
+- Never commit API keys to version control
+
+ **Privacy**
+
+- No user data stored or transmitted beyond the chat
+- All communication with Gemini API is encrypted (HTTPS)
+- Chat history cleared when leaving screen (not persisted)
+
+## Potential Future Enhancements
+
+Ideas for future development:
+
+- [ ] Persistent chat history (Room database)
+- [ ] Streaming responses (word-by-word display)
+- [ ] Voice input/output
+- [ ] Multi-language support
+- [ ] Share conversations
+- [ ] Favorite/bookmark responses
+- [ ] Integration with converter (e.g., "Convert 100 USD to EUR")
+- [ ] Market news integration
+- [ ] Price predictions
+- [ ] Custom prompt templates
+
+## Benefits for Users
+
+1. **Learning**: Understand forex concepts through conversational AI
+2. **Analysis**: Get instant insights on currency pairs
+3. **Convenience**: No need to leave the app to research
+4. **Context-Aware**: Gemini knows which currencies you're viewing
+5. **Free**: Using Google's free Gemini API tier
+6. **Fast**: Responses typically in 1-3 seconds
+
+## Testing Recommendations
+
+### Manual Testing Checklist
+
+- [ ] Chat button opens Gemini screen
+- [ ] Welcome message displays
+- [ ] Quick actions work (Analyze, Tips)
+- [ ] Example questions send correctly
+- [ ] User messages appear on right
+- [ ] AI responses appear on left
+- [ ] Loading indicator shows while waiting
+- [ ] Auto-scroll works with new messages
+- [ ] Error handling for invalid API key

+
+### Edge Cases to Test
+

+
+## Performance Considerations
+
+- **API Calls**: Debounced to prevent spam
+- **Memory**: Chat history kept in memory (consider limiting for long sessions)
+- **UI**: Smooth animations, no jank
+- **Network**: Handles offline gracefully
+

import com.google.ai.client.generativeai.GenerativeModel
import com.google.ai.client.generativeai.type.content
import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.Flow
import kotlinx.coroutines.flow.flow

class GeminiService(apiKey: String) {

 private val generativeModel = GenerativeModel(
 modelName = "gemini-1.5-flash",
 apiKey = apiKey
 )

 /**
 * Send a message to Gemini and get a response
 */
 suspend fun sendMessage(prompt: String): Result<String> {
 return try {
 val response = generativeModel.generateContent(prompt)
 val text = response.text ?: "No response received"
 Result.success(text)
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 Result.failure(e)
 }
 }

 /**
 * Send a message with streaming response
 */
 fun sendMessageStream(prompt: String): Flow<String> = flow {
 try {
 val response = generativeModel.generateContentStream(prompt)
 response.collect { chunk ->
 chunk.text?.let { emit(it) }
 }
 } catch (e: Exception) {
 emit("Error: ${e.message}")
 }
 }

 /**
 * Send a forex-specific query with context
 */
 suspend fun askForexQuestion(question: String): Result<String> {
 val contextualPrompt = """
 You are a helpful forex and financial market assistant. 
 Answer the following question about forex, currency exchange, or financial markets.
 Keep your answer concise, informative, and easy to understand.
 
 Question: $question
 """.trimIndent()

 return sendMessage(contextualPrompt)
 }

 /**
 * Get market analysis for a currency pair
 */
 suspend fun analyzeCurrencyPair(
 fromCurrency: String,
 toCurrency: String,
 currentRate: Double
 ): Result<String> {
 val prompt = """
 Provide a brief analysis of the $fromCurrency/$toCurrency currency pair.
 Current exchange rate: 1 $fromCurrency = $currentRate $toCurrency
 
 Include:
 1. Brief overview of factors affecting this pair
 2. Recent trends (general market knowledge)
 3. Key economic indicators to watch
 
 Keep it concise (2-3 short paragraphs).
 """.trimIndent()

 return sendMessage(prompt)
 }

 /**
 * Get general forex tips
 */
 suspend fun getForexTips(): Result<String> {
 val prompt = """
 Provide 5 important tips for someone interested in forex trading or currency exchange.
 Keep each tip concise and practical.
 """.trimIndent()

 return sendMessage(prompt)
 }
}

+# API Key Security Best Practices
 
+## Current Setup (Development)
+
+The app currently stores the Gemini API key directly in `MainActivity.kt`:
+
+```kotlin
+private val GEMINI_API_KEY = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE"
+```
+
+**This is OK for:**
+
+- Local development
+- Testing
+- Learning
+
+**NOT OK for:**
+
+- Production apps
+- Public repositories
+- Shared codebases
+
+## Production-Ready Solutions
+
+### Option 1: local.properties (Recommended for Small Projects)
+
+#### Step 1: Add key to local.properties
+
+```properties
+# local.properties
+GEMINI_API_KEY=AIzaSyXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
+```
+
+#### Step 2: Update build.gradle.kts
+
+```kotlin
+// app/build.gradle.kts
+android {
+ // ... other config
+ 
+ defaultConfig {
+ // ... other config
+ 
+ // Read from local.properties
+ val properties = Properties()
+ properties.load(project.rootProject.file("local.properties").inputStream())
+ buildConfigField(
+ "String",
+ "GEMINI_API_KEY",
+ "\"${properties.getProperty("GEMINI_API_KEY", "")}\""
+ )
+ }
+ 
+ buildFeatures {
+ buildConfig = true
+ }
+}
+```
+
+#### Step 3: Use in MainActivity
+
+```kotlin
+class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
+ private val GEMINI_API_KEY = BuildConfig.GEMINI_API_KEY
+ // ... rest of code
+}
+```
+
+#### Step 4: Ensure .gitignore includes local.properties
+
+```gitignore
+# Already in .gitignore
+local.properties
+```
+
+### Option 2: Environment Variables
+
+#### For CI/CD Pipelines
+
+```kotlin
+// app/build.gradle.kts
+android {
+ defaultConfig {
+ buildConfigField(
+ "String",
+ "GEMINI_API_KEY",
+ "\"${System.getenv("GEMINI_API_KEY") ?: ""}\""
+ )
+ }
+}
+```
+
+Then set environment variable in your CI/CD:
+
+```bash
+export GEMINI_API_KEY="AIzaSyXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX"
+```
+
+### Option 3: Firebase Remote Config (Best for Production)
+
+#### Advantages:
+
+- No keys in code or build files
+- Can update keys without app updates
+- Different keys per environment
+- Usage monitoring and analytics
+
+#### Implementation:
+
+```kotlin
+// Add Firebase dependency
+implementation("com.google.firebase:firebase-config-ktx:21.6.0")
+
+// Fetch API key remotely
+val remoteConfig = Firebase.remoteConfig
+remoteConfig.fetchAndActivate()
+ .addOnCompleteListener { task ->
+ if (task.isSuccessful) {
+ val apiKey = remoteConfig.getString("gemini_api_key")
+ // Use apiKey
+ }
+ }
+```
+
+### Option 4: Android Keystore (Most Secure)
+
+For highly sensitive keys:
+
+```kotlin
+// Store in Android Keystore
+val keyStore = KeyStore.getInstance("AndroidKeyStore")
+keyStore.load(null)
+
+// Use encrypted preferences
+val encryptedPrefs = EncryptedSharedPreferences.create(
+ "secret_shared_prefs",
+ MasterKeys.getOrCreate(MasterKeys.AES256_GCM_SPEC),
+ context,
+ EncryptedSharedPreferences.PrefKeyEncryptionScheme.AES256_SIV,
+ EncryptedSharedPreferences.PrefValueEncryptionScheme.AES256_GCM
+)
+
+val apiKey = encryptedPrefs.getString("gemini_api_key", null)
+```
+
+## Security Checklist
+
+Before deploying to production:
+
+- [ ] API key removed from hardcoded strings
+- [ ] API key not in version control
+- [ ] API key not in build output (APK/AAB)
+- [ ] Different keys for dev/staging/production
+- [ ] API usage monitoring enabled
+- [ ] Rate limiting implemented
+- [ ] Key rotation plan in place
+- [ ] Team members know security policies
+
+## What to Do If Key Is Exposed
+
+1. **Immediately revoke** the exposed key at [Google AI Studio](https://makersuite.google.com/)
+2. **Generate a new key**
+3. **Update your app** with the new key
+4. **Review API usage logs** for suspicious activity
+5. **Inform your team**
+6. **Implement proper key management** going forward
+
+## How to Check If You've Leaked a Key
+
+### Search Your Repository
+
+```bash
+# Search for potential API keys
+git grep -i "AIza"
+git grep -i "api.key"
+git grep -i "gemini.*key"
+
+# Check commit history
+git log -p | grep -i "AIza"
+```
+
+### Use GitHub Secret Scanning
+
+GitHub automatically scans for exposed keys in public repositories.
+
+### Tools
+
+- [git-secrets](https://github.com/awslabs/git-secrets)
+- [truffleHog](https://github.com/trufflesecurity/trufflehog)
+- [detect-secrets](https://github.com/Yelp/detect-secrets)
+
+## Additional Resources
+
+- [Android Security Best Practices](https://developer.android.com/topic/security/best-practices)
+- [Gemini API Key Management](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/api-key)
+- [OWASP Mobile Security](https://owasp.org/www-project-mobile-security/)
+
+## Quick Migration Guide
+
+### From Hardcoded to local.properties
+
+1. **Add to local.properties**:
+ ```
+ GEMINI_API_KEY=your_actual_key_here
+ ```
+
+2. **Update app/build.gradle.kts**:
+ ```kotlin
+ android {
+ buildFeatures {
+ buildConfig = true
+ }
+ 
+ defaultConfig {
+ val props = Properties()
+ file("../local.properties").inputStream().use { props.load(it) }
+ buildConfigField("String", "GEMINI_API_KEY", 
+ "\"${props.getProperty("GEMINI_API_KEY", "")}\"")
+ }
+ }
+ ```
+
+3. **Update MainActivity.kt**:
+ ```kotlin
+ private val GEMINI_API_KEY = BuildConfig.GEMINI_API_KEY
+ ```
+
+4. **Sync and rebuild**
+
+5. **Verify local.properties is in .gitignore**
+
+---
+
+**Remember**: The best security practice is defense in depth - use multiple layers of protection!
+
```

+# Gemini AI - Quick Start Card
 
+## 3-Step Setup
+
+### 1 Get API Key (1 minute)
+
+Visit: https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey
+ Sign in Create API Key Copy
+
+### 2 Add to App (30 seconds)
+
+Open: `MainActivity.kt`
+Replace: `"YOUR_API_KEY_HERE"` with your key
+
+### 3 Run (30 seconds)
+
+Sync Build Run Tap "Gemini Chat" button
+
+## Quick Actions
+
+| Action | What It Does |
+|--------|-------------|
+| **Analyze Currency Pair** | Get AI analysis of selected currencies |
+| **Forex Tips** | Receive 5 practical trading tips |
+| **Type Question** | Ask anything about forex/markets |
+
+## Example Questions
+
+```
+"What factors affect exchange rates?"
+"How does inflation impact currency?"
+"Explain USD/EUR movements"
+"Best time to exchange currency?"
+"What is a pip in forex?"
+```
+
+## Troubleshooting
+
+| Problem | Solution |
+|---------|----------|
+| **Build Error** | Sync Gradle files |
+| **Invalid Key** | Check for spaces/quotes |
+| **Network Error** | Check internet connection |
+| **App Crash** | Clean & rebuild project |
+
+## Documentation
+
+- **Setup Guide**: [GEMINI_SETUP.md](GEMINI_SETUP.md)
+- **Full Guide**: [GEMINI_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md](GEMINI_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md)
+- **Security**: [API_KEY_SECURITY.md](API_KEY_SECURITY.md)
+
+## Free Limits
+
+ 60 requests/minute
+ 1,500 requests/day
+ 1M tokens/month
+
+## Security Note
+
+ Don't commit API keys to Git!
+For production, use `local.properties` or remote config.
+
+---
+
+**Need Help?** Check [GEMINI_SETUP.md](GEMINI_SETUP.md) for detailed instructions.
+
```

 **Trading tips** and market insights
 **Beautiful Material 3 UI** matching your app theme
 **Quick actions** for common queries
 **Error handling** with retry options
 **Free to use** within generous API limits

### Free API Limits

- 60 requests per minute
- 1,500 requests per day 
- 1 million tokens per month

### Security Notes

- API key is currently hardcoded (OK for development)
- For production, use `local.properties` or remote config
- Never commit API keys to version control
- Full security guide provided in `API_KEY_SECURITY.md`

### Complete Documentation Provided

All guides are ready to use:
- Quick setup (3 minutes)
- Technical implementation details
- Security best practices
- Troubleshooting steps
- Example questions
- Customization options

### Note About Linter Errors

The linter shows errors in `GeminiService.kt` because the Gemini SDK hasn't been synced yet. These will **automatically resolve** once you:
1. Open the project in Android Studio
2. Sync Gradle files (File Sync Project with Gradle Files)
3. Let Gradle download the Gemini dependency

The integration is complete and ready to use! Just add your API key and you're good to go! "}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

import android.os.Bundle
import androidx.activity.ComponentActivity
import androidx.activity.compose.setContent
import androidx.activity.enableEdgeToEdge
import androidx.compose.foundation.layout.fillMaxSize
import androidx.compose.material3.MaterialTheme
import androidx.compose.material3.Surface
import androidx.compose.runtime.*
import androidx.compose.ui.Modifier
import androidx.lifecycle.viewmodel.compose.viewModel
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.data.StockWithPrice
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.ui.screens.MainScreen
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.ui.screens.StockListScreen
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.ui.screens.ForexMarketScreen
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.ui.screens.GeminiChatScreen
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.ui.theme.SimpleConvertTheme
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.viewmodel.MainViewModel
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.viewmodel.StockListViewModel
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.viewmodel.ForexMarketViewModel
import com.example.forexcalculatorapp.viewmodel.GeminiViewModel

class MainActivity : ComponentActivity() {
 // Store your Gemini API key here
 // Get your free API key from: https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey
 private val GEMINI_API_KEY = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE"

 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 enableEdgeToEdge()
 setContent {
 SimpleConvertTheme {
 Surface(
 modifier = Modifier.fillMaxSize(),
 color = MaterialTheme.colorScheme.background
 ) {
 ForexCalculatorApp(geminiApiKey = GEMINI_API_KEY)
 }
 }
 }
 }
}

@Composable
fun ForexCalculatorApp(geminiApiKey: String) {
 val mainViewModel: MainViewModel = viewModel()
 val stockListViewModel: StockListViewModel = viewModel()
 val forexMarketViewModel: ForexMarketViewModel = viewModel()
 val geminiViewModel = remember { GeminiViewModel(geminiApiKey) }

 var showStockList by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var showForexMarket by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var showGeminiChat by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }
 var selectedStock by remember { mutableStateOf<StockWithPrice?>(null) }

 // Capture current currency info for Gemini context
 val mainUiState by mainViewModel.uiState.collectAsState()

 if (showStockList) {
 StockListScreen(
 viewModel = stockListViewModel,
 onStockSelected = { stock ->
 selectedStock = stock
 showStockList = false
 },
 onBackPressed = {
 showStockList = false
 }
 )
 } else if (showForexMarket) {
 ForexMarketScreen(
 viewModel = forexMarketViewModel,
 onBackPressed = {
 showForexMarket = false
 }
 )
 } else if (showGeminiChat) {
 GeminiChatScreen(
 viewModel = geminiViewModel,
 onBackPressed = {
 showGeminiChat = false
 },
 fromCurrency = mainUiState.fromCurrency.code,
 toCurrency = mainUiState.toCurrency.code,
 currentRate = mainUiState.currentRate
 )
 } else {
 MainScreen(
 viewModel = mainViewModel,
 selectedStock = selectedStock,
 onBrowseStocksClick = {
 showStockList = true
 },
 onForexMarketClick = {
 showForexMarket = true
 },
 onGeminiChatClick = {
 showGeminiChat = true
 },
 onStockUsed = {
 selectedStock = null
 }
 )
 }
}
